87a5(mdo sde): bcod par byed pa dang / ma byin pa len par byed pa dang / 'dod pa log par g.yem pa byed pa dang / brdzun du smra bar byed pa dang phra ma byed pa dang / tshig rtsub po smra
87a6(mdo sde): ba dang / tshig khyal pa smra ba dang / bsgrub sems kyi sems dang / gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang / log par blta ba can yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa
87a7(mdo sde): rab 'byor 'di snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu 'di'i bstan pa 'di 'dra ba las na/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa yin par the tshom med kyis/
87a8(mdo sde): ldem po dag 'di bdag gis dri bar bya'o// snyom mo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ rigs kyi bu de la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis
87b1(mdo sde): ci las bsam ste 'di skad du bdag ni srog bcod par byed pa dang / ma byin pa len pa byed pa dang / 'dod pa log pa dben pa byed pa dang / rdzun du smra ba byed pa dang /
87b2(mdo sde): phra ma byed pa dang / tshig rtsub po smra ba dang / tshig khyal pa smras pa dang / bsnab sems can dang / gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang / log par lta ba can yin
87b3(mdo sde): no zhes smra/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad mi len pas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la tshig su bcad de smras pa/ byang chub lam ni bla med pa'i// lam
87b4(mdo sde): ni bdag gis rnam par sbyang // srog chags bye ba phrag stong yang / lam de la ni yongasu bkod// srog ni bdag gis shin tu gtugs// de phyir bdag ni de skad smra//
87b5(mdo sde): gang dag lam ni rnam par sbyang // de dag srog bcod pa zhes bya// lhas ni byang chub byin pa yin// rgya byin tshangs pas ma byin te// mi byin pa ni bdag gis blang // de phyir bdag
87b6(mdo sde): ni mi byin len// srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir// 'thu che theg pa blang bas na// de phyir theg pa chen po 'di// ma byin blangs zhes bya ba yin// 'dod pa log par
87b7(mdo sde): yongs shes pa// chos 'dod yin zhes de dag shes// 'dod pa de dag 'dod ma yin// de phyir log byed spyod par byed/ sgrar ni ji snyed gdags pa rnams// de dag
87b8(mdo sde): rdzun zhes yang dag gsungs// med pa'i phyir na de rdzun te// brdzun du smra ba zhes kyang bya// theg pa dman pa 'dod pa yi// sems can gang dag su yang rung // sems can de dag
87b9(mdo sde): su yang rung // sems can de dag dbye ba'i phyir// theg pa che la 'god par byed// phra ma'i tshig ni smra byed cing // mu stegasu na gzhan 'byed par byed// sems can lam
88a1(mdo sde): ngan lhung ba rnams// yang dag lam la 'jug par byed rgol ba de dag tshar gcad de// de dag shin tu dga' ba med/ rtsub pa'i tshig
88a2(mdo sde): ni smras nas kyang / bdud rnams thams cad pham par byas// rtsub pa'i tshig ni sgra mod kyang // 'on kyang sems la khro ba med// sems can smin par bya ba la// dbang
88a3(mdo sde): po rnams kyi thabs la ltog/ gang la dgong gsung ba yi// dgongs pa'i tshig ni rab tu shes// des na bsam ste rab smra shing // sems can bye ba 'dul bar byed// kha
88a4(mdo sde): gcig la ni bsam ste smras// kha gcig de dag brdzun par shes// de phyir bsam ste smra ba yis// chos kyi mngon sum rtogs par byed// sems can ji snyed yod pa
88a5(mdo sde): rnams// re re la yang de dag ni// mi min lha'i bde ba dag/ 'jig rten nu ni bsgrub sems byed// bde ba gang dang ldan gyur na// 'jig rten mgon po phan byed 'gyur//
88a6(mdo sde): bde ba de ni sems can kun// ldan par mkhas rnams bsnab sems byed// sems can thams cad rgyal gyur ces// rtag tu de dag bsnab sems byed// brnab seMs
88a7(mdo sde): de 'gro yin pas na// de phyir brnab sems can zhes smras// dam pa'i chos ni 'jig pa'i tshe// stobs chen rnams kyi tshar bcad de// de dag rang gis bde ba spong // chos
88a8(mdo sde): dang srog chags spong mi byed// 'jig rten kun gyi rgol ba dang // sems can kun dang mi 'thun te// thams cad 'thun par bya ba'i phyir// de dag gnod sems ston
88b1(mdo sde): byed de// de dag bskal par brtsod byed dam// bskal pa bye bar brtsod kyang rung // dam pa'i chos ni spong mi byed// slar yang ldog par yong mi byed// log par//
88b2(mdo sde): lta la dpa' ba rnams// de dag 'dus byas kun la snyoms// log par lta ba rab tu shes// yang dag lta ba'i rnam pa rtogs// gang dag de 'dra'i chos dang
88b3(mdo sde): ldan// de dang de dag khrims la gnas// gnas med la ni gnas/ bcas nas// mkhas rnams byang chub rtog par 'gyur// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
88b4(mdo sde): kyis// rigs kyi bu de la bsod snyoms de byin nas 'di skad du// skyes bu dam pa 'di lta bu dag gis ni/ dad pas byin pa'i bsod snyoms log par ltung
88b5(mdo sde): bar mi byed do// zhes sbas so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor zan ma zos te/ phyi ma red kyi dus na nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas/ bcom ldan
88b6(mdo sde): 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ ji ltar gyur pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la gsol
88b7(mdo sde): to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' de su yin par shes sam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ma 'tshal lags so// /
88b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan shAkyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni// bud med 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ste// dka' ba bkod pa'i thabs
89a1(mdo sde): la mkhas pas sems can rnams 'dul bar byed do// rab 'byor dper na// yungs 'brus shing rta bkang ba la/ yul ma kha ta'i
89a2(mdo sde): khal bcu tshad nyi shu yod pa las/ lo brgya zhing yungs 'bru re re bor ba ni bgrang ba de lta bur tshul gyis shing rta de'i bar 'bru'i mtha' ches myur du rtogs par
89a3(mdo sde): nus kyi byang chub sems dpa' bud med 'gyur bas dga' bkod pa'i thabs la la mkhas pa mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir/ sems can bla na med pa
89a4(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasasu smin par byas pa dang / sems can mang po lha dang mi skye ba la bkod pa rnams ni de lta ma yin no// de nas bud
89a5(mdo sde): med de bud med lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun du bdar to// rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byang nas/ bya rgod phung po'i ri la bcom ldan 'das
89a6(mdo sde): ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bud med de 'ong ba thag ring po nas gzigs te/ gzigs nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la
89a7(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor bud med lnga brgya tsam 'od 'di dag mthong ngam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
89a8(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ 'di dag thams cad ni// byang chub sems dpa' bud med 'gyur bas dga' ba bkod pa'i thabs la mkhas pas yongs su smin par byas nas/
89a9(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod pa sha stag go// de nas bud med de bud med lnga brgyas bskor zhing / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song te/
89b1(mdo sde): phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig 'dug go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bud med de bsu nas/ thal mo
89b2(mdo sde): sbyar te phyag byas so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ 'phags pa'i chos ma thob
89b3(mdo sde): ba dang / 'phags pa'i lus su mi gnas pa'i bud med la ci'i phyir phyag 'tshal// bud med des smras pa/ gnas rtan sha ri'i bu gal te/ 'jig rten na 'phags
89b4(mdo sde): pa ni gang dag lags/ 'phags pa ma lags pa ni gang dag logs mkhyen na/ khyod spobs par mdzod cig/ gnas rtan shA ri'i bus smras pa/ che zhe khyod kyi
89b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten na/ 'phags pa gang dag yin pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa gang dag shes sam/ smras pa/ btsun pa sha ri'i bu bdag gis 'tshal to// smras pa/
89b6(mdo sde): de dag gang yin/ smras pa/ btsun pa sha ri'i bu 'phags pa'i rigs mi bcod pa gang dag lags pa de dag ni 'phags pa'o// sangs rgyas dang chos dang / dge
89b7(mdo sde): 'dun gyi rigs mi bcod pa gang dag lags pa de dag ni 'phags pa'o// 'phags pa rnams la byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / 'phags pa
89b8(mdo sde): ma yin pa rnams la thar ba 'dod pa gang dag lags pa de dag ni 'phags pa'o// btsun pa sha ri'i bu gzhan yang bu med rgyan gyi legs par brgyan pa/
90a1(mdo sde): gos btsang ma srab mo gyon pa/ phye ma dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa rnams la rten pa/ 'dod pa'i yon tan
90a2(mdo sde): lnga dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral ba ni che bla'i// grwa bcom pa rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa dben pas ni de
90a3(mdo sde): lha ma leg so// btsun pa sha ri'i bu gzhan yang don 'di nyid brda' sprad pa'i phyir khyod la dpe' bstan par bgyi na/ btsun pa sha ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du
90a4(mdo sde): dgongs/ mching bu'i nor bu rin po che bI dur+ya'i snod du bcug pa bdams sam/ 'on te nor bu rin che rin thang med pa 'dam rdzab du bcugs pa 'am/
90a5(mdo sde): gnas rten sha ri'i bus smras pa// che zhe nor bu rin po che rin thang med pa 'dam rdzab du bcug pa 'dam gyi/ 'ching bu'i nor bu bai dUr+ya'i snod du bcug pa ni de lta
90a6(mdo sde): ma yin no// smras pa btsun pa sha ri'i bu de bskrin du/ bud med 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen nyid kyi sems dang mi bral ba ni
90a7(mdo sde): chos 'phags kyi/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa dben na gnas pa ni de lta ma lag so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus smras pa/
90a8(mdo sde): ci che zhe khyod theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin nam/ smras pa btsun pa sha ri'i bu zegs pa chen po ni gang legs yang mi gnas la/
90b1(mdo sde): ldog pa yang ma mchi so// smras pa che zhe gal te theg pa chen po ni gang la yang mi gnas pa ldog pa med pa na/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhug
90b2(mdo sde): pa gang dag yin pa de dag ci la zhugs/ smras pa sha ri'i bu theg pa chen po pa rnams ni ci la yang mi gnas te/ ma rig pa zad par bgyi ba'i slad du de
90b3(mdo sde): dag mi gnas pa nas/ rga shi'i bar du zad par bgyi ba'i slad du/ de dag ma gnas so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa sha ri'i bu ma rig pa nas rga shi
90b4(mdo sde): bar du mi zad pa'i slad du'o// des na de dag ni skye ba'i chos can yang ma lags 'gag pa'i chos can yang ma lag so// gal te skye bar gyur na ni las zad
90b5(mdo sde): par 'gyur na/ gang gis phyir mi skye ba de'i phyir mi zad do// de bas na zad pa yang ma mchis skye ba yang ma mchi so// dge sbyong gi chos ni mi skye ba'i chos cano//
90b6(mdo sde): btsun paM sha ri'i bu de ltar na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ma skyes dang / ma 'gags pa lagaso// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sho ri'i bus/ bud med de la 'di skad
90b7(mdo sde): ces smras so// che zhe khyod ni lhar bcad pa'i 'jig rten dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang bcas pas phyag byas pa'i 'os yin na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
90b8(mdo sde): 'byor kyis lta ci smos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang zag gis gang zag la
91a1(mdo sde): tshod 'dzin pa su zhig mchis te/ che zhe 'di ni rgyan gyis legs par brgyan la/ 'di ltar spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan
91a2(mdo sde): pa lagaso// bud med des smras pa/ btsun pa sha ri'i bu 'di ni rgyan kyi spobs pa ma lagaso// smras pa 'o na gang gis spobs pa yin/ smras pa btsun pa
91a3(mdo sde): sha ri'i bu brgyad po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan lags te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i rkyen dang / snying rje
91a4(mdo sde): chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la gnas pa'i rgyan dang / sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems kyi rgyan dang / thos pa'i chos yongasu tshol ba la chog mi
91a5(mdo sde): shes pa'i rgyan dang ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams dang / ji ltar kun chub par byas pa rnams la tshul bzhin du so sor rtogs cing spyod pa'i rgyan dang / sems can
91a6(mdo sde): yongasu smin par byed kyang chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i rgyan dang / chos zab mo rnam par nges pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / sems can gyi dbang
91a7(mdo sde): po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa'i ye shes kyi brgyan dang / brgyan de yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlab dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i rgyan te/ btsun pa
91a8(mdo sde): sha ri'i bu brgyad po de dag lags te/ rgyan de dag gis brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan no// de nas bcom
91b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha rI'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das che zhe 'di gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes lags/ de nas
91b2(mdo sde): bud med des bdag nyid kyi lus ci 'dra ba de kho na nyid gcig 'dra ba'i bud med de dag gcig/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu mdun du sprul to// sprul nas
91b3(mdo sde): kyang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa sha ri'i bu khyod kyis bud med 'di la ga las shi 'phos te 'dir skyes zhes dris shig/
91b4(mdo sde): gnas brtan sha ri'i bus smras pa/ bud med 'di ni sprul pa yin/ sprul pa la 'chi 'pho dang skye ba med do// smras pa btsun pa sha ri'i bud de bzhin du/
91b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas ni/ chos thams cad sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso// chos thams cad sprul pa'i ngo bo
91b6(mdo sde): nyid kyi mtshan nyid du shes pa gang yin pa de dag la ni 'chi 'pho 'am skye ba 'dri bar mi bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la
91b7(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bud med 'gyur ba zhes bya ba yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrug pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
91b8(mdo sde): zhing mngon par dga' ba nas shi 'phos nas/ sems can yongs smin par bya ba'i phyir 'dir 'ongaso// sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' bud med 'gyur 'dis/
92a1(mdo sde): mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir/ sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
92a2(mdo sde): byang chub tu smin par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bud med 'gyur bas/ bud med kyi gzugs nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal
92a3(mdo sde): nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lung ma snyan pa'i bar dang / bdag gi bud med kyi lus ma mchis par
92a4(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ skyes pa'i lus su ma gyur kyi bar du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mi ldang lag so// bud med lnga brgya po de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
92a5(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag gis kyang bud med kyi rang bzhin las gyur te/ skyes pa'i rang bzhin du ma gyur kyi bar dang / bla na
92a6(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan kyi bar du bdag cag mi ldang lags// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi 'dzum pa mdzad
92a7(mdo sde): do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang ga'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid dang / de nas de'i mod la bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal kyi sgo nas
92a8(mdo sde): 'od zer du ma byung ba sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / btsod ka dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ste/ 'od der
92b1(mdo sde): de dag kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa 'od kyis khyab par byas nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten kyi bar du thugs ste/ phyir logs nas bcom ldan
92b2(mdo sde): 'das kyi spyi btsug tu mi snang bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' 'o stan las lang ste/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la ba
92b3(mdo sde): der log nas thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma
92b4(mdo sde): mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'
92b5(mdo sde): bo khyod kyi byang chub sems dpa' bud med 'gyur ba bud med lnga brgyas bskor ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la btugs pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa mthong
92b6(mdo sde): lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' bud med 'gyur ba 'di/ bskal pa bgrangs pa las 'das pa na/ bla na med
92b7(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
92b8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas yon tan gyi rgyal po spobs pa can zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ des byang chub thob pa na bud med lnga brgya po 'di dag gzungs thob pa dang / thog pa med pa'i slob
93a1(mdo sde): pa dang ldan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bud med 'gyur ba 'dis/ yon tan kyis rgyan bstan pa gang dag yin pa'i
93a2(mdo sde): rgyan brgyad po de dag gis brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgyar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyal po spobs pa
93a3(mdo sde): can des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyuraro// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyal po can de'i sangs rgyas kyi
93a4(mdo sde): zhing yang 'byor cing rgyas la/ bde ba dang lo legs pa dang / mi dang skye ba mang pos gang bar 'gyur te/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i long spyod dang mnyam par 'gyur ro// sangs
93a5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med ni mi tsam yang med par 'gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad pad ma'i snying po las rdzus te skyes nas/ dkyil mo dkrung bcas nas 'dug la/
93a6(mdo sde): gtsang zhing tshangs par spyod pa dang / rgyan brgyad po de dag gis brgyan par 'gyuraro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bud med 'gyur ba de dang / bud med lnga brgya po
93a7(mdo sde): de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon sum du lung ston pa thob nas/ dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba de kho nas/ ta la bdun tsam srid kyi na mkha' la 'phags nas/
93a8(mdo sde): de'i mdo kho na la khye'u lo bcu drug lon pa tsam du snang bar gyur to// de dag par snang de las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
93b1(mdo sde): de dag thams cad kyis spyi bor phyag gis byug so// de nas de dag thams cad kyis de'i tshe gzungs pa dang / kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// de nas
93b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la zung la/ gzhan dag la yang rgyas par yang dag par
93b3(mdo sde): ston gcig/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun
93b4(mdo sde): dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod kyis spobs pa bkod pa'i rgyan ces bya bar zung shig/ bud med 'gyur ba lung bstan pa zhes bya rab zung shig/ bcom
93b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bud med 'gyur ba 'khor dang bcas pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
93b6(mdo sde): bo dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / klu dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rang ste/ bcom ldan
93b7(mdo sde): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa bud med 'gyur ba lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// / rdzogs s+ho//
93b8(mdo sde): rgya gar gyi mkhan po brang bar ma dang / shi len dra bo de dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tshab ban de shes sde la sogs pas/ bskur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
94a1(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya tsan drod ta ra dA rika bya ka na na ma ma hA ya na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bu mo zla mchog lung bstan pa/
94a2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pas dus gcig na/ bcom ldan
94a3(mdo sde): 'das yang ba can na/ tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na/ dgra bcom pa lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang // cang shes kyi sem
94a4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjesu thob pa/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba/ yongasu zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu
94a5(mdo sde): rnam par grol ba/ sems thams cad kyi dbang gi pha rol tu son pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong thams cad kyang
94a6(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa/ gzungs thob pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ tshig
94a7(mdo sde): thogs pa med pa/ tshul chos pa med pa/ kha bsags med pa/ shes kyi khye 'dod pa'i sems dang bral ba/ zang zing med par chos ston pa/ chos zab mo la bzod pa/
94a8(mdo sde): dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/ mi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa/ bdud kyi las las yang dag par 'da' ba/ las kyi sgrib pa spangs pa/ chos kyi rang bzhin las the
94b1(mdo sde): choms med pa/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med par smon lam shin du brtsabs pa/ bzhin 'dzum pa// khro gnyer med pa/ tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs
94b2(mdo sde): kyis smra ba la mkhas pa/ sems yongasu ma gtugs pa/ spobs pa rgyun mi chad pa/ chos mnyam pa nyid la bzod pa thob pa/ mi 'jigs pa chen pos 'khor mtha'
94b3(mdo sde): yas pa zil gyis gnon pa/ tshig gcig gis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag gcig tu bston pa'i ye shes la mkham pa/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ong ba dang /
94b4(mdo sde): da ltar byung ba'i chos thams cad sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang rmi lam dang / mig g.yor dang / brag cha dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med
94b5(mdo sde): pa dang / dben pa dang / g.yo ba med pa dang / gzung ba med pa dang / na mkha'i ngo bo nyid lta bur mos las/ shes rab dang ye shes tshad med pa la mkhas pa/ sems can
94b6(mdo sde): gyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston pa/ sems thogs pa med pa/ chos la sred pa dang bral ba/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa med pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa/ chos ji lta ba bzhin
94b7(mdo sde): du shes pa la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa'i yon tan bkod pa yongasu zin pa/ sangs rgyas rje su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag par rgyun tu mngon du gyur pa/
94b8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la gsol ba 'debs pa/ shes pa la mkhas pa/ kun nas ldang ba dang / lta ba dang / nyon mongs pa dang bag sna chog spong ba la mkhas po/ ting de
95a1(mdo sde): 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad kyis rnam par brtse ba'i mngon par shes pa la mkhas pa/ sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub
95a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / 'byung dka' dang / spos kyi glang po
95a3(mdo sde): che dang / brtson pa mi btong dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / spos kyi dbang po 'od zer rab tu gtog pa dang / 'brug sgra dang / gser 'od
95a4(mdo sde): rnam par nges pa'i rgyal po dang / sred med kyi bu dang / lag rin po che dang / lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang / na mkha' mdzod dang / snang ba'i rgyal po dang / mthong ba'i dga'
95a5(mdo sde): dang / sems can bsgrol dang / rtag tu bsgod dga' dbang po dang / ngan song spong dang / rdo rje'i gnas rnam par gnon pa dang / 'jig rten gsum gyi gnas rnam par
95a6(mdo sde): gnon pa dang / mi g.yo ba'i gnas rnam par gnon pa dang / mthong bden yod dang / dpal gyi snying po dang / pad ma'i dpal dang / ba glang spos kyi glang po che dang /
95a7(mdo sde): spobs pa zab mo dang / spobs pa chen po dang / chos 'phags dang / chos kyi rang bzhin the tsom med 'gyur dang / seng ge stabs 'gro dang / 'jigs pa kun sel dang /
95a8(mdo sde): sgrib pa thams cad rnam pa sel ba dang / seng ge chen po mngon par sgrogs pa'i sgra dang / brjod pa med dang / spobs pa brtsegs dang / byang chub sems dpa'
95b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong dang yang thabs gcig go// de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po
95b2(mdo sde): rnams dang / sna chen po la rtogs rnams dang / grong khyer dang ljongs kyi mi rnams dang / zham ring ba rnams dang / nyug rum ma rnams dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rig
95b3(mdo sde): dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas ste/ yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po na/ li tsa byi dri ma med par
95b4(mdo sde): grags pa zhes bya ba/ longs spyod mang ba/ mdzod dang bang mdzod mang ba zhig gnas te/ de la chung ma dri ma med pa zhes bya ba mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog
95b5(mdo sde): bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod de/ zla ba dgu 'das pa dang / de las bu mo gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa/ blta ni sdug pa yan lag dang nying lag thams
95b6(mdo sde): cad legs par rdzogs pa zhig btsas so// bu mo de btsas ma thag tu khyim de thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur cig/ sa chen po yang rab tu g.yos par
95b7(mdo sde): 'gyur/ phyi rol gyi sgo gang gi wa dag las kyang mar khu dang / 'bru mar dag rab tu 'dzag cing / zhan pa dang / mgon med pa dang / bkren pa dang / sdug phongs pa gang
95b8(mdo sde): yin pa de dag ci 'drir spyod do// yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po na/ rnga bo che dang / rdza rnga dang khar rnga dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa/ gang yin pa de dag thams
96a1(mdo sde): cad kyang mardung bar sgra 'byin par gyur/ me tog gi char chen po dag kyang rab tu bab par gyur to// khyim kyi gras bzhir yang rin po che sna
96a2(mdo sde): tshogs kyis rab tu gang ba'i gter chen po bzhi byung zhing kha bye ste/ kun tu snang bar gyur to// bu mo de btsas ma thag tu ngu skad mi klog la lhag par yang sor mo bcu thal
96a3(mdo sde): mo sbyar te de'i tshe/ tshigasu gcad pa 'di dag smraso// sdig las byas pas 'dir ni gtsang ma yi/ lu su mi skye yid du 'ong bar min/ sdig las byas pas 'dir ni longs
96a4(mdo sde): spyod dag/ 'byor pa'i khyim rnamasu yang mi skye'o// sprin du la yang dag sdom dang bag yod cing / gus dang bcas pas bla ma snyen bkur ba'i/ gya nom rang bzhin las
96a5(mdo sde): kyis rtag tu ni/ long spyod bdag nyid chen po'i khyim du 'grub/ 'dren pa rgyal ba 'od bsrungs bsod snyoms phyir// yangs pa can gyis grong du zhugs pa na/ bdag
96a6(mdo sde): gris khang bzang steng nas mthong gyur cig/ mthong nas der ni bdag yid rang ba dran/ de tshe bdag yid rab tu dang gyur nas// bdag la me tog med cing byug pa med/
96a7(mdo sde): byes spos med zas dang skes byas/ ston pa 'di la ces mchod bya smras sems/ de nas bdag gi sgra thos sangs rgyas ni/ 'gro ba bsgrol phyir bang zing ming skyed cing /
96a8(mdo sde): 'jig rten brje phyir thugs rje bskyed nas ni// sangs rgyas bsod snyoms slad du 'jig rten brgyan// gal te rgyal ba de dag mchod 'dod na// sangs rgyas nyid phyir khyod
96b1(mdo sde): kyis smon lam btob// byang chub sems skyed brten gyur gang yin pa/ de las lhag mchod srid pa gsum na med// bar snang sgra thos de nas bdag gis na/ mtshan
96b2(mdo sde): mchog spros pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ba dang // byang chub phyir ni mi g.yo yid skyes nas// khang pa de nas rang gi lus 'tshong ste// bar snang ta la bdun srid 'dug nas ni//
96b3(mdo sde): phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // de bzhin rgyal ba 'od srung de'i sku// rin chen ri dang lhun po 'dra ba mthong // rgyal ba'i mthus ni bdag gi lag 'thil
96b4(mdo sde): du/ man da ra ba'i phur ma 'byung 'gyur zhing / de dag gla gis 'od srung gtor pa dang // me togs bdag su gyur pa mkhas la gnas// gang dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
96b5(mdo sde): mtha' yas pas// mtshan gyi sku brgyan de dag ltas yang // ji ltar 'od sreng steng na 'dug pa ltar// de dag la yang me tog gdugs nyid snang // mkha' la gnas
96b6(mdo sde): shing bdag gi tshig smras pa// bskal pa chu rdul snyed du spyad bya zhing // byang chub ma thob bdag phyir mi ldog gi// bdag ni sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtsor gyur
96b7(mdo sde): gcig/ bdag gis seng ge'i nga ro de thos nas// de tshe stong phrag bcu gnyis tshang ba'i// lha mi lha min gnod spyan srin po rnams// sangs rgyas byang chub
96b8(mdo sde): mchog la yang dag zhugs// thos nas sum bcu rtsa gsum ltar skye zhing // las bzang byas pa chud zar ma gyur pas// de nas shi 'phos 'dzam gling 'dir
97a1(mdo sde): 'ongs kyis/ de phyir skye bo rnams kyis bsod nams byos// gang tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum gnas gyur pa// de tshe bdag gi rgyal bshag thub mchod//
97a2(mdo sde): bdag ni 'dod dang long sprod lus mi gnyis// rgyal ba yang dang yang du mchod par bya// bdag gis bsod nams rnam smin de mthong zhing // nyin gcig 'dra bar tshe rabs brgya
97a3(mdo sde): yang dran// bdag 'dir skyes pa'i dpal yang 'di 'dra na// mkhas pa su zhig rgya ba gus mi byed/ de nas bu mo des tshig su bcad pa de dag smras nas cang mi zer bar
97a4(mdo sde): 'dug par gyur to// de'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i 'bras bu'i rgyu mthun pas lus la lha'i gos rin po che dag gyon bzhin du byung bar gyur nas/ de'i lus las zla ba
97a5(mdo sde): las shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'od zer gyi mdog tu snang ba dag kyang byung ngo // de nas pha ma dag gis de'i ming zla mchog ces bya bar btags so// de nas bu mo
97a6(mdo sde): zla mchog de skad gcig dang / zang cig dang yud tsam gcig gis 'di lta ste/ dper na bu mo lo brgyad lon pa lta bu'i na chod du kun du snang ngo // des sa phyogs
97a7(mdo sde): gang dang gang dag du 'greng ba dang / 'chag pa dang / 'dug pa dang / mal bcas par gyur pa de dang de dag du 'od zer gyi mdog lta bu dog snang bar gyur to// de'i
97a8(mdo sde): spu'i khung bu thams cad nas tsan dan sa phyogs pa'i dra dag dang / kha nas/ kyang ud pa la sngon po'i dri dang byung bar gyur to// de nas yangs pa can gyi grong khyer
97b1(mdo sde): kyi tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / de las gzhan rigs che ba dang / rigs mtho ba dag gis/ bu mo zla mchog gi lus dang / gzugs dang /
97b2(mdo sde): kha dog yongasasu rdzogs pa thos so// thos nas kyang 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi sems shin tu bkris par gyur cing / so so nas 'di snyam du sems te/ de bdag
97b3(mdo sde): gir chung mar gyur na ci ma rung snyam mo// de na skye bo pha po che rnams de thob par bya ba'i phyir sems brtson par gyur te/ de dag las kha gcig ni li tsa byi dri ma
97b4(mdo sde): med par grags pa la bsnyen par byed/ sten par byed cing bsnyen bkur byed par gyur to// kha cig ni nor bu dang / gser dang / dngul dang / rdo rje dang / bai dUr+ya
97b5(mdo sde): dang sbugs dang / an d+ha rI la dang / dung dang / mon shel dang / byi ru bye ba rnyed dag sbyin zhing 'dod pa bskyed par byed do// kha gcig ni nor dang / 'bru dang
97b6(mdo sde): khyim dang long spod dang / kha zas dag ston par byed do// kha gcig ni bran dang bran mo dang / zho shes 'tsho ba dag la/ gsad pa dang / bcing ba dang / rdeg
97b7(mdo sde): ba la sogs po dag gis/ 'jigs pa ston par byed do// kha cig ni li tsa bye dri ma med par grags pa la 'di skad ces zer te/ gal te khyed kho bo cag
97b8(mdo sde): la bu mo zla mchog 'bul bar mi byed na/ de'i khyod la sdug bsngal 'byung bar bya zhing / khyod la gnod pa chen po yang bya'o// zhes zer ro// de nas li tsa byi dri ma med
98a1(mdo sde): par grags pa 'di snyam du ma la dpung dag lags nas bdag bzung zhing bcom ste/ bu mo yang 'phrogs la bdag kyang srog dang / bral
98a2(mdo sde): bar mi 'gyur grang snyam nas skrag cing dngangs la sgyid lugs cing spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas/ de dran pa nyams shing bzhin gyi sro shi la rab tu ngu zhing mchi ma blags te/
98a3(mdo sde): mig mi 'dzum par bu mo zla mchog la lta'o// bu mo zla mchog gi rang gi pa ngu zhing yi shi la gdong mchi mas g.yog cing yul yul bor gyur pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de
98a4(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces smraso// yab ci'i blad du 'di ltar bshum shing mchi ma dag rab tu klog par mdzad ma pa lags de nas li tsa byi dri ma med par grags pas/ bu mo
98a5(mdo sde): zla mchog la 'di skad ces smra so// bu mo 'di ltar khyod dbrog cing khyod kyi phyir grong khyer thams cad zab mo rtsod pa kun tu byung ba khyod kyis mi shes sam/ de'i phyir
98a6(mdo sde): dpung dag lhags shing bcom ste/ khyod phrogs par mi 'gyur grang snyam nas/ de nas mchi ma phyung ba yin mod// de nas bu mo zla mchog gis rang gi pha la tshig su gcod de
98a7(mdo sde): smras pa/ gal te 'dzam gling sems can thams cad dag sred med bu 'dra'i brtson 'grus thob gyur cing // de dag mtshon thogs bdag slad rgyug gyur kyang /
98a8(mdo sde): de dag rnams kyis bdag gzhom rdo thog/ byams sems ldan pa dang mtshon mi tshugs// ro langs na dang 'jigs pa gzhan mi 'byung // byams sems tha
98b1(mdo sde): ba zhe sdang ma mchis pas/ byams pa'i sems la gzhan gyis gnod mi 'gyur// yab bdag 'jig rten dag la byams pa che/ ngan bu bdag bzhin 'gro la dga'
98b2(mdo sde): bar gnas// nam yang gzhan la sdug bsngal ma bgyis pas// de phyir ngan bu sdug bsngal mi 'gyur yab// chags bral nam yang 'dod chags ma mchis shing // byams pa/
98b3(mdo sde): yongs sgoms zhe sdang mchis ma lags// bdag la chags sdang gti mug ma mchis ste// de phyir ngan bu gzhan gyis mi thub yab// yab dang yum la byams pa mchis pa ltar//
98b4(mdo sde): 'gro ba kun la rgyun tu bdag de bzhin// yab gang 'jig rten dag la de 'drar byams// de ni nams kyang gzhan gyis gnod mi 'gyur// na mkhas dogs 'dzin par bgyid gyur cing // /
98b5(mdo sde): lhun po yongs 'bru'i nang du gnas gyur tam// rgya mtsho chen po gnag rjes zhugs gyur kyang // bdag 'joms bgyid pa rdo thog ma mchis yab// de nas bu mo zla mchog gis
98b6(mdo sde): tshigasu gcad pa de dag smras nas// rang gi pha ma 'di skad ces smras so// yab yum de'i slad du 'di ltar deng nas dgung bdun na bu mo zla mchog phyir 'byung bar// 'gyur
98b7(mdo sde): zhing / byung nas kyang rang gang 'dod pa'i khyim zab 'dam par 'gyur gyis/ der khyed cag gis bsgrims par bya zhing / lam srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo'i phyogs
98b8(mdo sde): thams kyang rgyan gyis brgyan par bya zhing / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa'i cho ga dag gis kyang byi dor gyis shig/ ces shul po che
99a1(mdo sde): dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo thams cad du dril bu dkrol sgra bsgrags du gsol// de nas bu mo zla mchog gi pha ma gnyis rang gi nas byung ste/
99a2(mdo sde): 'di skad du deng nas zhag bdun na bu mo zla mchog phyir 'byung bar 'azhing / byung nas kyang bu mo gang 'dod pa'i khyim thab 'dam par 'gyur gyis/ der khyed cag gis sgrim par bya
99a3(mdo sde): zhing / lam srang dang / bzhi mdo dang sum mdo'i phyogs thams cad rgyan dag gis brgyan par bya zhing / me tog dang / bdag spos dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa'i
99a4(mdo sde): cho ga dag gis kyang byi dor gyis shig ces rang bzhin de dag kun tu sgrags so// de skad ces so sor zos pa dang / yangs pa can gyi kye bo phal po che rnams 'di
99a5(mdo sde): ltar rang rang gi lam srang dang / bzhi mdo dang sum mdo'i phyogs dag rgyan par bya ba la brtson par gyur cing / sems la 'di snyam du cis kyang bu mo zla mchogs ni
99a6(mdo sde): bdag la 'dzin gyi gzhan dag la ni ma yin grang snyam du sems te/ de dag phan tshun 'dren pas rang rang brgyan par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ tshong dpong dang / khyim bdag dang /
99a7(mdo sde): bram ze dang / rgyal ba rnams dang / las mi'i bar dag kyang shin tu khrus byas shing lus legs par byugs te// gos bzang po bgos shing rgyan sna tshogs gyis lus
99a8(mdo sde): brgyan nas/ rang rang gi g.yog 'khor rnams la khyed cag sgrims shig/ gal te bu mo zla mchoga'u bu cag gi gan du rang mi 'ong blta na/ de'i phyir de mthus drong la 'brog
99b1(mdo sde): shig ces bskal bar byed do// de ltar nag bdun 'das pa dang / skye bo phal po chen dag ngo mtshar du 'dzin par gyur nas/ bu mo zla mchog lta ba'i phyir 'dus par
99b2(mdo sde): gyur to// de nas bu mo zla mchog nyi ma drug pa la zla ba nya ba'i tshe gso spongs yan lag brgyad par yang dag par blang ste/ mtshan mo mi nyal tsam na/ steng gi khang bzang gi
99b3(mdo sde): thog na 'chag cing 'dugo// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus bu mo zla mchog gi lags pa g.yas par pad+ma sdong bu ni gser/ 'dam ma ni dngul dang / ze ba ni be dur+ya/ snying
99b4(mdo sde): po ni rdo'i snying pa las byas la/ 'dab ma 'bum phrag du ma yod pa/ lta na sdug pa 'od gsal ba zhig byung bar gyur to// pad+ma de'i snying po'i dbus na/ de bzhin gsheg
99b5(mdo sde): ba'i sku/ sku mdog gser 'dra la/ gzi brjid 'bar ba/ 'od kyis snang bar mdzad pa/ skyes bu chen po'i sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan pa/ dpe
99b6(mdo sde): byad bzang po brgyad bcus gzugs mdzes par byas pa/ dkyil mo dkrung gis bzhugs pa zhig kyang byung / bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de'i 'od kyis
99b7(mdo sde): khyim de thams cad snang bas gsal bar gyur to// de nas bu mo zla mchog gis pad+ma de mthong zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mthong ba dang / dga' zhing mgu la yid
99b8(mdo sde): rang ste/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de la tshig su bcad de gsol pa// 'di 'dra'i dpal dang ldan pa khyod// ci lags
100a1(mdo sde): lha 'am 'on te// lha mi gsang ba 'am mi 'am ci// su lags dris pa nges par gsungs// khyod skya gser mdog 'od gsal ba'i// tshad ni dmigs su
100a2(mdo sde): mchis shing // skad gcig mdog gser bcod ka dang // myur bar shel 'od 'dra bar gda'// ngan bu slan chad lus kyi ni// 'du shes ma mchis sems mi g.yo// mgon po khyod kyi sku
100a3(mdo sde): mthong nas// bdag ni dga' ba yang ba skyes// khyod sku dpal 'bar me 'dra zhing // ring las nyi bzhin mdzes mdzegs pa// ji ltar gzung zhing rab tu gnas// gang gnas 'dir ni gang du
100a4(mdo sde): gshegs// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku des// bu mo zla mchog la phyir tshigasu bcad de bka' stsal pa// nga ni lha min klu yang min// mi 'am ci min gnod sbyin min// sangs
100a5(mdo sde): rgyas sha kya se ge yis// nga ni khyod kyi gan du gtang // nga ni lha min gnod sbyin min// klu min mi 'am ci ma yin// chos byung nga deng khyod kyi phyir// lha mi 'dul bas bka'
100a6(mdo sde): stsal to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de la bu mo zla mchog gis phyir tshig su bcad de gsol pa// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba// de mdog ci 'dir gsung
100a7(mdo sde): la// de yi rtags dang dbyibs gsungs dang // de thos bdag gis rtogs par 'gyur// khyod 'dir sangs rgyas mtshan gsung na// de yi mdog rtags dbyibs mi gsung /
100a8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rung spyod gang dang mthun// mi mnyam mdzad spobs 'dir gsung shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku des// bu mo zla mchog la tshig su gcad de bka' stsal pa/
100b1(mdo sde): de ni sku mdog gser 'dra zhing // mtshan mchog bcu rtsa gnyis mnga'// sems can kun gyi mchod rten ste// de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do// byed ldan sems can rnam kyi ni// spyod pa
100b2(mdo sde): mchog dang dman pa dag/ thugs gcig gis ni rtogs mdzad do// de phyir sangs rgyas shes brjod do// chos kun rnam pa thams cad du// des ni mi mkhyen cung zad med// ye shes
100b3(mdo sde): kun gyi pha rol byon// de na sangs rgyas zhes brjod do// des ni sems can kun gyi sems thugs gcig gis ni rtogs gyur kyang // kun gyi sems la nam du yang // rlom pa mi
100b4(mdo sde): mnga' gzhan du na// sangs rgyas sprod pa sbyin pas 'phags// tshul khrims spyod pas mthong 'phags shing // bzod dang brtson pas mngon 'phags la// bsam gtan shes rab yang
100b5(mdo sde): dag 'phags// bzo rnams thams cad legs brlabs pas// des ni mi mkhyen chung zad med// byams pa thugs rje phun sum tshogs// de phyir sangs rgyas shes brjod do// gang gi bla
100b6(mdo sde): me 'khor lo yi// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor cing // zhing rnams bye ba rnams rig la// bdag med rab tu bstan mdzad cing // gang gi sangs rgyas zhing stong dang // brgya dang khrag khrig
100b7(mdo sde): sbed rnams dag/ ljags kyis rab tu khyab pa// de phyir sangs rgyas zhe brjod do// zhing rnams bye ba stong phrag ni// gang ga'i bye ma snyed dag du// dbyangs kyis go bar mdzad pas/
100b8(mdo sde): de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do// 'dren pas phyag ni ya cig gis// zhing rnams ji snyed blang mdzad cing // bskal pa bye bar de bzhugs pas// de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do//
101a1(mdo sde): zhing rnams stong phrag bye snyed na// ri bo ldan pa ji snyed pa// skra nyagacig gis de sbams shing // zhing rnams bye bar 'phen mdzad la// chos rnams
101a2(mdo sde): kun la rang byung zhing // gnas nas go 'phang mchog mnyel// sems can bcings pa rnams 'grel pa// de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do// dbang ldan gyur cing stobs bcu mnga'
101a3(mdo sde): mi bsgyings rtogs pa thugasu chud// sangs rgyas chos la nem nur med// de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do// dbu yi gtsug tor ltar mi mthong // sprin mnga' dag dang ldan pa dang //
101a4(mdo sde): stobs dang dbang po lnga mnga' zhing // byang chub yan log lam la gnas// drang tshul bzang zhing 'grogs na bde// zhi zhing dul la bla na med// g.yo med drang po gsal ba
101a5(mdo sde): ste// de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do// de ni rtag tu mnyam bzhag cing de la g.yeng ba mi mnga' la// sems can don gyi dus su gsungs// de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do// yon
101a6(mdo sde): tan kun dang legs ldan zhing // de ni 'gro ba'i mchod rten te// thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs// de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do// nga yis bskal pa'am yang na ni//
101a7(mdo sde): bskal pa bye ba phrag brgyad yang // gang phyir sangs rgyas de don brjod// de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do// de nas bu mo zla mchog dga' zhing mgu la yid rang ste// rab tu dga'
101a8(mdo sde): zhing dga' ba dang // yid bde ba skyes nas// de bzhin gshegs pa lta bas yongs su bsgom par gyur te// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de la phyir tshig su gcad de gsal pa// gang
101b1(mdo sde): gi yon tan de 'dra ba'i// rdzogs sangs rgyas ltar rnga thog gam// chos 'di thos na mkhas pa ni// su zhig skad 'ga' 'am khyim la dga'// ji srid bde gshegs ma mthong bar// bag ni gnyid
101b2(mdo sde): dang skyugs spong zhing // zas dang skom yang mi 'tshal la// stan la'ang mchis par mi bgyid do// bdag gis khyod shin tu rang gyur cing // yon tan bdag nyid thos nas bdag rab dang // mdo
101b3(mdo sde): sum sangs rgyas de ni mthong 'gyur la// slar zhing mtshungs med dga' bar 'gyur lags grang // bskal pa stong phrag bye bar 'jig rten// skyes bu mchog rnams mthong ba shin tu dkon//
101b4(mdo sde): dgra bcom de yi mtshan thos bdag gis ni// bsnyed pa legs brnyed bdag gi rgyal ba blta// sprul pa de yis de la 'di skad smras// sems can mchog de tshal chen nang na bzhugs//
101b5(mdo sde): de yi dge 'dun stong phrag brgyad po dag/ dpa' bo sdig med mi gtsang spongs pa yin// de dag re re'ang lag pa ya cig gis// bskal pa mang por stong gsum zhing 'degs cing //
101b6(mdo sde): ting 'dzin mngon shes spobs pa rab thob la// thos pas mi 'khrugs rgya mtsho 'dra ba yin// de dag rgyal ba mchod phyir rdzu 'phrul gyis// bye ba dpag med zhing du skad 'gos 'dod//
101b7(mdo sde): dong nas sangs rgyas bye snyed mngon mchod cing // brten rnams phyir yang skad 'gas ldog par byed// bdag tu 'du shes sangs rgyas 'du shes med// zhing du 'du shes sems can
101b8(mdo sde): 'du shes med// spos pa sna tshogs kun gyis ma gos shing // sems can tshogs chen rnams kyi don yang byed// dgra thul de dang byang chub sems dpa' dang // de bzhin dge sbyong dge
102a1(mdo sde): @'dun lnga 'dod cing // thub dbang drung nas chos mchog nyan 'dod na// tshal chen gang na ston de bzhugs par song // de nas bu mo zla mchog pad+ma de nyid dang // de bzhin gsheg
102a2(mdo sde): pa'i sku ji ltar bzhugs pa de nyid thogs bzhin du khang bzangs steng de nas babs nas// rang gi pha ma ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang // rang gi pha ma la tshigasu bcad de smras pa// yab
102a3(mdo sde): gzigs ngan bu'i sug pa g.yas pa na// pad+ma gser sdong mdzes pa yid du mchi// skyes bu dam pa'i sku la gzigs shig yum// mthong na su zhig de la skyabs mi mchi// rang gi gnas kun
102a4(mdo sde): gser 'dog 'dra ba'i// 'od kyis gang ba bdag gis mthong lags yum// skad gcig la yang du mar 'dog 'gyur bas// sku tshe'i tshad ni gzung bar rngo mi thog/ de slad rgyal ba'i
102a5(mdo sde): spyan sngar tshal chen du// rgyal bgo'u ta ma gzigs su gshegs so yum// me tog rnams dang spos mchog bsnams nas su// de bzhin gshegs pa la ni mchod par bgyi// zla ba
102a6(mdo sde): mchog gi pha dang ma dag gis// yid du 'ong ba'i tshig thos legs so// zhes gos rnams dang ni bdug spos spos dag dang // me tog rnams dang / phreng ba byug pa'ang blangs/ rnga chen rdza
102a7(mdo sde): rnga ha ba shang gdugs rnams dang / dung dang rgyal mtshan gling bu pi wang dang / rin chen sil snyan yid 'ong thogs nas ni/ de dag khang pa de nas nges par byung / de'i tshe nyi ma bdun pa de la srog chag
102a8(mdo sde): 'bum phrag du ma dag bu mo zla mchog blta ba'i phyir 'dus par gyur nas/ de dag las kha cig ni 'dod tshogs kyi sems kun nas bkris par gyur// kha cig ni lta 'dod par gyur// kha cig
102b1(mdo sde): ni rtogs skyed par gyur nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po rgyan gyis brgyan to// khye'u dang blo dag kyang steg bu dang / sgo khang dang rta babs dang / skar khu dang /
102b2(mdo sde): pu shu dang / khang partsegs pa dang / khang bzangs kyi steng dag tu dong ste 'khod par gyur to// de nas bu mo mchog de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku pad+ma la bzhug pa de nyid kyang thogs bzhin
102b3(mdo sde): du pha ma dang 'khor mang po rnams dang / lhan cig du me tog dang / bsdug spos dang / spos dang me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdug dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan
102b4(mdo sde): dag thogs te/ pheg rdob pa sna tshogs byed pa dag gis yongs su skor cing mdun du bdar te/ rang gi gnas nas byung ngo // de nas srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dag gis de grong bar
102b5(mdo sde): gyi dbus su byung ba mthong ba dang / bdag gis 'di bzung bar bya'o// bdag gis 'di bzung bar bya'o snyam du sems shing rab tu rgyug go// de'i tshe yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po na skye bo
102b6(mdo sde): bal po che de dag lhan gcig tu rgyug pa'i che/ ha ha/ tshur shog tshur shog zer ba'i sgra chen po byung bar gyur to// de nas bu mo zla mtshogs gis de'i mod la skye bo phal po che rgyug pa de dag mthong
102b7(mdo sde): ste/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku pad+ma la bzhugs pa de nyid kyang thogs bzhin du bar snang gyi na mkha' la shing ta la srid tsam du mngon par 'phags te 'dug par gyur to// 'dug
102b8(mdo sde): nas kyang skye bo phal po che dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// bzod ldan bdag mdzes pa yi lus 'di ni// chags pa'i sems las byung ba ma yin te// kha dog gser mdog me gyi
103a1(mdo sde): 'bar ba 'dra// shin tu yid 'ong kho mo'i lus 'di ltos// gang dag yul rnams la ni skam med gnas// me 'dag 'obs 'dra 'bar ba'i 'dod spong zhing /
103a2(mdo sde): dbang po drug rnams sdom pas bsdams pa dang // gang dag gzhan gyi bud med rnams mthong na// ma sring snyam du 'du shes bskyed byed na// de dag mdzes shing shin tu lta sdug la/
103a3(mdo sde): rtag tu mchog tu yid du 'ong bar 'gyur// gang gis sa 'di kun tu khyab byed pa// bdag gi spu yi khung nas byung ba'i 'dri// 'dod chags sems kyis bdag gis de ma
103a4(mdo sde): bsgrubs// de ni sbyin dang dul ba'i 'bras bu yin// kho mo 'dod chags ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed// 'dod chags bral la chags pa ma skyed cig/ ji ltar smras bden nam yang
103a5(mdo sde): brdzun min te// mdun gyi thub dbang de ni bdag gi dbang // sngan chad khyed cag kho mo'i bar gyur la// kho mo 'ang khyed kyi ma dang pho nu dang // sring mo 'ang bar yang yang dang yang gyur pas/
103a6(mdo sde): su zhig ma la 'dod chags sems bskyed byed// sngan chad kho mos khyed kun gsad gyur cing // khyed kyis kho mo'ang sngan lhad bsad gyur pas// thams cad phan tshun dgra bo bshed yin
103a7(mdo sde): nad/ khyed cag ji ltar 'dod chags sems bskyed byed// chags pas gzugs dang ldan par mi 'gyur zhing // chags sems can dag bde 'gror 'gyur// chags pa'i sems ldan
103a8(mdo sde): mya ngan mi 'da' bas// de phyir 'dod chags yongs su spang bar bya// 'dod pa'i bzhi las dmyal bar 'gro 'gyur zhing // 'dod chags las ni yi dgas dud 'gror 'gyur// gang dag
103b1(mdo sde): 'dod chags bkris pa'i sems ldan pa// grul bum lha min gnod sbyin sha bar 'gyur// 'dod chags las ni nar bzeng po dang // lce med gzugs mi sdug pa dag tu 'gyur// gang dag
103b2(mdo sde): 'dod chags ngan pa'i spyad pa spyod pa// rnam pa sna tshogs skyon gyi snod du 'gyur// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal srid thob pa dang // sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i dbang phyug rgya byin dang // tshangs pa dbang
103b3(mdo sde): ldan dbang sgyur gang yin pa// de ni tshangs spyod yangs pa spyad pa yin// rtag tu 'dod pa dag la skam pa rnams// dmu long 'on pa glen pa khyi phag dang // rnga mo bong bu spre'u dang glang po dang // stag
103b4(mdo sde): dang gnag rta phye leb sbrang bur 'gyur/ ta gang dag tshangs spyod yangs pa spyod byed pa// sa'i dbang phyug dga' ba rnams dang ni// mchong dpon khyim bdag blon par gyur nas ni// bde zhing yid
103b5(mdo sde): bde zhi bar 'gyur// rang rgyal rnams dang // de bzhin dgra bcom dang // sangs rgyas mtshan gyis smras pa gsal gyur cing // bla me byang chub zhi ba rtogs gyur nas// sems can tshogs can
103b6(mdo sde): rnams kyi don mdzad 'gyur// 'dod pas 'khol ba dag ni bsreg pa dang // yang na du bas gdug cing gsad pa 'am// bcing dang de bzhin rjeg sdig mgo dang ni// rna mig sna dang rkang pa bcad
103b7(mdo sde): bar 'gyur// 'dod spyod nyes pa gcig tu mazad de// 'dod rnams mi mthun nyes pa mtha' yang med/ gal te myur tu de las thar 'dod na// nur gshegs rgyal ba de'i spyan sngar 'deng /
103b8(mdo sde): lha mas mchod pa'i sangs rgyas ma rtogs par// na dang dpung gzhan dag yang demin ning / rgyal ba 'byung ba bskal ba brgyar dkod gyis thams cad lhan cig 'grogs te 'did par bya// bu
104a1(mdo sde): mo zla mchog gis tshig su bcad pa de dag smras zag tu de nas de'i mong la/ sa chen po rab tu g.yos par gyur cing / na mkha'i dkyil na/ 'khod pa'i lha'i bu
104a2(mdo sde): rnams kyis kyang a la la zhes ca co dang ga zha'i sgra chen po 'bum phrag du ma dag rab tu phyung ste/ me tog gi char dag kyang rab tu phab/ sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang rab tu
104a3(mdo sde): gsil to// skye bo phal po che de dag kyang shin tu yid phyung zhing spu zing zhes byed la ngo mtshar du 'dzin par gyur nas/ 'ga' yang phyin cad 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / za ba
104a4(mdo sde): dang / 'chab pa dang / gnod sems dang / rnam par gnod pa med cing thams cad kyang sems kyi sgrib pa dang bral la/ lus rab tu gling nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur nas/ bu mo zla
104a5(mdo sde): mchog de la ma dang sring mo dang / ston pa lta bur sdug par gyur cing phyag byas te/ ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byugs pa de dag gis
104a6(mdo sde): kyang mngon par gtor to// gtor ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus de nas de'i mod la me tog de dag me tog gis gdugs dpag tshad byed tsam pa zhig tu gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs
104a7(mdo sde): pa'i sku de'i dbu'i gtsug gi drang zad kyi steng na 'dug par gyur to// de nas bu mo zla mchog ga bar snang de las babs te/ sor bzhi tsam gyi sa la ma reg par na mkha' la chag bzhin
104a8(mdo sde): du langs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ngo // de'i rkang pa bzhag pa dang / gteg pa thams cad du sa chen po rab tu g.yos pa dang / yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po'i srog
104b1(mdo sde): chags brgyad khri bzhi stong thams pa yang bu mo zla mchog song ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur te/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dge slong lnga brgya tsam dang lhan gcig tu snga dro'i dus kyi
104b2(mdo sde): che shams thabs dang chos gos te/ lhung bzed thogs nas bsod snyoms kyi phyir langs pa can gyi grong khyer chen por zhugs pa dang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis bu mo zla mchog skye bo phal po ches yongs su
104b3(mdo sde): bskor cing rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po bu mo zla mchog 'di ni
104b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gro na/ bdag gcag gi ci bzod pa thob pa zhig gam/ 'on te ma yin zhes shes par byas/ dri ba 'ga' zhig yongs su dri bar bya 'am zhe na/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
104b5(mdo sde): ti'i bu dge slong de dag dang lhan gcig tu mo zla mchog ga la ba der song ste byin nas/ bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod gar 'gro bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i
104b6(mdo sde): bu gang 'di skad du bu mo khyod gar 'gro zhes gsung ba ni gnas rten gang du bzhud pa de nyid du bdag kyang mchi lagaso// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ bu mo kho bo ni yang po can du 'jug la khyod ni
104b7(mdo sde): yangs pa can nas byung na/ 'o na khyo 'di skad du gnas brtan gang du bzhud pa de nyid du bdag kyang mchis lag so// zhes zer ba de ji ltar rigs par 'gyur/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa
104b8(mdo sde): rang ti'i bu khyod zhings gang nas 'deg cing gang du 'jog par med de/ shar da ti'i bus smras pa// bu go kha ba ni rkang pa nagapa' la 'deg cing namakha' nyid la 'jog par byed do//
104'a1(mdo sde): bu mos smras pa btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bdag kyang sug pa na mkha' las 'deg cing na mkha' nyid la 'jog par bgyid de na mkha'i khams la niH
104'a2(mdo sde): dad pa cung zad kyang ma mchis pas/ btsun pa sha ra dadwa ti'i bu bdag gis 'di skad du khyod gang du bzhud pa de nyid de bdag kyang mchi lag so zhes smras so// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i
104'a3(mdo sde): bu khyod gang na gshegs/ sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo kho bo ni mya ngan las 'das par 'gro'o// bu mo smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos mya ngan las 'das par
104'a4(mdo sde): mchi ba lags pas/ bdag kyang der mchi ba lags sam/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu smras pa/ bu mo gal te chos thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba yin na/ 'on
104'a5(mdo sde): khyod ci'i phyir yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mi 'gro// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yongs su mya ngan las 'das par phyin pa ni yongs su mya ngan 'das zhing /
104'a6(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba la ni skye ba dang / 'jig pa ma mchis/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mtsho ba la ma gtogs par yang gang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar
104'a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ba 'ga' yang ma mchis lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa lags pa'i slad du'o// de skad ces smras pa/
104'a8(mdo sde): dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ti'i bus bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo 'o na ci khyod nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa yin/ 'on te rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
104'b1(mdo sde): pa gang la yang dag par zhugs pa yin nam/ 'on te theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin nam/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang 'di skad du khyod theg pa gang la yang
104'b2(mdo sde): dag par zhugs yin/ zhes gsung ba ni/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i slad du khyod nyid la zhu yis khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan gdab du gsol/ btsun pa sha ra da ti'i bu khyod kyis
104'b3(mdo sde): rtogs pa'i chos gang lags pa'i chos de ci nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa zhig lags sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa shig
104'b4(mdo sde): lags sam/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa zhig lags sam/ sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de la ni rnam par rtags pa
104'b5(mdo sde): 'am spros pa 'ga' yang med la/ tha dad pa nyid kyang ma yin/ gcig pa nyid kyang ma yin/ sna tshogs nyid kyang ma yin pa'i phyir ro// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
104'b6(mdo sde): de'i slad du rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa dang / spros pa ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad dang / tha dad du dbye ba ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad la ni gang gnas par 'gyur ba 'am/
104'b7(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba'i chos de dmigs su ma mchis lags so// sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis spobs ni ngo mtshar nA gzhan yang khyod
104'b8(mdo sde): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig la gnyen bkur byas bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra da ti bu gang 'di skad ces khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig la gnyen
105a1(mdo sde): bkur byas zhes gsung ba ni de bzhin dang / chos kyi dbyings ji snyed pa la'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu smras pa/ bu mo de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings kyang ji
105a2(mdo sde): snyed cig yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ma rig pa dang srid pa'i sred pa ji snyed pa'o// sha ra da ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo ma rig pa dang srid pa'i sred pa yang
105a3(mdo sde): ji snyed gcig yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra da ti'i bu sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa bu mo sems can gyi khams yang ji snyed gcig
105a4(mdo sde): yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yum ji snyed pa'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bus
105a5(mdo sde): smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis ji zhig lan btab pa yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gnas brtan gyis gang yongs su dris pa de nyid kyi lan bdag gis btab lags so//
105a6(mdo sde): sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo khyodas ci zhig yongs su dris/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yi ge gang dag yongs su dris pa de dag nyid nges par bstan lags so//
105a7(mdo sde): sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo yi ge rnams ni rang bzhin gyis 'gags pa ste/ bdags su med pa yin pas de dag ni nges par snyan par mi nus so// bu mos smras pa btsun
105a8(mdo sde): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad la yang gang yongs su dris pa dang / gang gis lan
105b1(mdo sde): btab pa de gnyis ka yang dmigs su ma mchis pa lags so// sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo 'di ltar khyod ni bzod pa thob cing byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa dag yod pa kho
105b2(mdo sde): na yin pas khyod ni ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang
105b3(mdo sde): chub ces bgyi ba de yang spros pa lag so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur// zhes bgyi ba de yang spros pa lags so// nye ba zhes bgyi ba 'am ring ba zhes bgyi ba de yang
105b4(mdo sde): spros pa lags so// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang 'di skad ces khyod ni ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// zhes gsung ba ni/ btsun
105b5(mdo sde): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni skye ba ma mchis pa/ 'gag pa ma mchis pa/ chad pa ma mchis pa/ rtag pa ma mchis pa/ don gcig pa ma lags pa/
105b6(mdo sde): don tha dad pa ma lags pa/ 'ong ba ma mchis pa/ 'gro ba ma mchis pa/ brjod du ma mchis pa/ 'byung ba ma mchis pa/ rang bzhin mchis pa lags pas/ de la ni gang mngon par rdzogs
105b7(mdo sde): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba 'ga' yang dmigs su ma mchis lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub ni gnyis kyi mtshan nyin ma lags pa ste/ byang chub ni gnyis su ma mchis
105b8(mdo sde): shing gnyis dang bral ba ma lags pa'i slad du'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar song shig/
106a1(mdo sde): dang // kho bo cag kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir der 'dong ngo // de nas gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bu mo zla mchog gis 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa sha ra da
106a2(mdo sde): ti'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni nyan 'tshal ba rnams la chos ston par mi mdzad lagaso// sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo 'o na de bzhin gshegs pa su dag la chos ston par
106a3(mdo sde): mdzad/ bu mos smras pa/ brdzun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang dag gnyan par bgyid kyang dga' bar mi dgyid/ mngon par dga' mi dgyid pa rnams la lo// sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/
106a4(mdo sde): bu mo sems can mang po dag chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'dong zhing // de bzhin gshegs pa yang de dag la chos ston par mi mdzad dam/ bu mos smras pa/ brdzun pa
106a5(mdo sde): sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs par 'du shes shing chos la ngar 'dzin par gnas pa'i sems can rnams ni 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste/ bdag cag la chos ston par mdzad pa'o// 'di
106a6(mdo sde): ni chos ston par bgyi'o// snyems lags kyi/ chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa rnams ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ chos sam/ bstan pa zhes bgyi bar sems pa ma mchis lagaso//
106a7(mdo sde): de nas gnas rten 'od srung chen pos/ gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shwa rA dwa ti'i bu 'di la bu'i spobs pa dang / ldan pa'i bu mo 'di
106a8(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'gro bas na/ der ni chos bsten pa chen po yang 'byung bar 'gyur bas bdag cag phan bcad de phyir log na ni 'bru cag la legs kyis bdag cag chos
106b1(mdo sde): mngon par rab tu gtor to//
106b2(mdo sde): mnyan par de las pa de las phyi rol tu gyur na ni ma yin no// de nas zlos chen po de dag phyir phyogs te/ de nyid nas phyir log par gyur to// de nas bu mo zla mchog tshal chen po'i khang pa brtseg
106b3(mdo sde): pa'i gnas ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song te phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang / bdug spos dang /
106b4(mdo sde): spos dang / me tog phre ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to// skye bo phal po de dag gis kyang
106b5(mdo sde): ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang / gdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la g+ha tor to// gtor ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la me tog de dag me tog gi gdug
106b6(mdo sde): rgyar dpag tshad bcu tsam pa zhig tu gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang zad kyi steng na 'dug par gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad
106b7(mdo sde): ces smras so// bu mo khyod gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir 'ongs/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas ni gang du 'gro bar 'gyur/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du dgongs/ gang bdag gi sug pa
106b8(mdo sde): g.yas pa na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku pad+ma la bzhugs 'di gang nas shi 'phos de 'dir byon la/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas ni gang du skye bar 'gyur snyam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
106b9(mdo sde): bu mo 'di ni smras pa ste/ sprul pa la ni 'chi 'bo yang med la/ skye ba yang med do// bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdag gis kyang de bzhin du sprul pa'i rang bzhin gyi thams cad la
107a1(mdo sde): gang 'chi 'pho ba 'am/ skye ba de ma mthong lags so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba don yod kyis bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo
107a2(mdo sde): bud med kyi lus kyis ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus na/ khyod ci'i phyir bud med kyi lus sgyur bar mi byed/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni stong pa
107a3(mdo sde): nyid lags pas/ stong pa nyid la ni ldog pa dang 'gyur ba ma mchis lags so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa 'dzin gyis bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod kyis de
107a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngam/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'dis gzigs pa ltar bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong lag so// byang chub
107a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' spobs pa rtsegs kyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod chos kyi gtam la spobs par gyis shig/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyis bu chos kyi dbyings la ni brjod par bgyi ba dang /
107a6(mdo sde): rab tu brjod par bgyi ba ma mchis la/ chos kyi dbyings ni yi ger bgrang ba yang ma lags so// byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa thogs pa med pas smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis sngon
107a7(mdo sde): gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyan sngar chos ji lta bu thos/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i slad du/ steng du gzigs shig dang / bar snang ci 'dra ba de bzhin gshegs pa
107a8(mdo sde): yang de 'dra la/ de bzhin gshegs pa ci 'dra bar snyan pa nyid kyang de 'dra nyan pa nyid kyang de 'dra ste/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de lta bu lags so//
107b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag la ji ltar sbyin pa byin zhing ji ltar yongs su bsngos/ bu mos smras pa/
107b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la sbyin pa zhig phul bar gyur na/ de la rgyu ba
107b3(mdo sde): ji lta bu zhig 'byung bar 'gyur lags smras pa/ bu mo sprul pa la ni rgyu ba 'ga' yang 'byung ba med do// bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu bdag gis kyang sngon gyi de bzhin gshig
107b4(mdo sde): pa dag la de ltar sbyin pa sbyin zhing yongs su bsngos pa lagaso// byang chub sems dpa' thogs med sems kyis smras pa/ bu khyod sems can rnams la ji ltar byams pas khyab
107b5(mdo sde): par byed/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyis bu sems can de dag ji ltar ba de kho na bzhin du'o// smras pa bu mo sems can de dag kyang ji lta bu yin/ smras pa rigs kyi bu 'das pa yang ma lag/
107b6(mdo sde): ma 'ongs pa yang ma lags/ da ltar byung ba yang ma lags la/ sems de yang 'das pa ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma lags/ da ltar byung ba yang ma lags pas/ byams pa sgom pa
107b7(mdo sde): de ni 'dra'o zhes bdags par rngo mi thogs lags so// byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis chos kyi mig thob bam/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs
107b8(mdo sde): kyi bu bdag gis sha'i mig kyang mthob lags na/ chos kyi mig lta b.rag la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pas smras pa/ bu mo khyod yun de srid gcig nas bla na med pa
108a1(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag bzhugs/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ji srid gcig nas smig rgyu byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa'i
108a2(mdo sde): yun de srid nas bdag kyang byang chub la yang dag par zhugs lags so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas/ bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyed yun ji
108a3(mdo sde): srid cig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ bu mos smras pa/ yun ji srid gcig gis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa so so
108a4(mdo sde): skye bo'i sa las 'da' bar 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyis las kyang 'da' bar 'gyur ba de srid kyis lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus
108a5(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar sring mo 'di gtso bo chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu dag dang lhan gcig yang dag par smra yang 'jig par mi
108a6(mdo sde): bgyid/ dman par mi bgyid pa ni bu mo 'di'i spobs pa dang ngo mtshar lag so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la/ bu mo zla mchog gis 'di skad ces smras so// btsun
108a7(mdo sde): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/ zhugs ni ji tsam du chung yang sreg pa'i ngo bo nyid lags pas/ ji tsam du nye bar len pa snyed pa de tsam du sred par bgyid lagaso//
108a8(mdo sde): btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bgrod pa dang tha dad du dbye ba cung zad kyang ma mchis pas/
108b1(mdo sde): de dag thams bdag dang gzhan dag gis nyon mongs cad sreg pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa lags so// sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ byang chub thob nas khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi
108b2(mdo sde): zhing ci 'dri bar 'gyur// mo smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra da ti'i bu bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na/ gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bu ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i
108b3(mdo sde): sems can dman pa la mos pa/ shes rab chung ba gzhan gyi don la mi lta ba nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dag gis ming yang grags par mi 'gyur lags so// /
108b4(mdo sde): shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo gang khyod 'di skad ces chos kyi dbyings ni gcig go// de bzhin nyid ni gcig go// zhes zer na/ 'o na ci khyod kyis nyan thos rnams ni dman pa nyid
108b5(mdo sde): yin la/ ci sangs rgyas rnams ni lhag pa yin par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ ba lang gi rjes kyi
108b6(mdo sde): chub gang lags pa dang / rgya mtsho chen po gang lags pa'i chab de dag la ni bye brag cung zad kyang ma mchis lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang ba lang gi rjes la ni rgya mtsho chen po ltar
108b7(mdo sde): sems can tshad ma mchis pa dag gi go skabs ma mchis lag so// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du de bzhin shegs pa rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings
108b8(mdo sde): gcig las nges par byung ba lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang nyan thos rnams kyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa dag ltar sems can tshad ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag gis don bgyi
109a1(mdo sde): / par rngo mi thog lagaso// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/ yungs 'bru'i khong su chud pa'i na mkha'i khams gang lags phyogs
109a2(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi khongasu cud pa'i na mkha'i khams gang lags pa'i na mkha'i dad pa'i khams de dag la ni bye brag cung zad kyang ma mchis lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang
109a3(mdo sde): yungs 'bru'i khongasu chud pa'i na mkha'i la ni phyogs bcu'i khongasu chud pa'i na mkha' ltar grong dang / grong khyer dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho phrang dag rab tu mi gnas shing
109a4(mdo sde): kun tu mi gnas la/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab dag kyang ma mchis rgya mtsho chen po dag kyang ma mchis lags so// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
109a5(mdo sde): nyan thos rnams kyang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis cig las nges par byung ba lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang nyan thos rnams kyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa
109a6(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas da ltar sems can tshad ma mchis pa dag gi don bgyid par rngo mi thogs lags so// sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo sangs rgyas rnams dang
109a7(mdo sde): nyan thos rnams kyis rnam par grol ba cig pa ma yin nam/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang 'di skad ces sangs rgyas rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyi rnam par grol ba/
109a8(mdo sde): gcig go zhes gsungs pa ni skur pa 'debs pa lags so// sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo ci'i phyir de skad sgra/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i slad du de khyod
109b1(mdo sde): nyid la yongasu zhus/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan gdab du gsol/ gang gi tshe btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sems rnam par grol ba de'i tshe ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
109b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams lags 'thil ltar mnyam par kun tu gnas par 'gyur lags sam/ ji ga shing ljon pa dang / thams cad kyis khyod logs su mngon par phyogs te/ btud mngon
109b3(mdo sde): bar btud/ mngon par rab tu btud lags sam/ ji ga ngan song thams cad da rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba lags sam/ ji ga sems can thams cad nyon moms pa dang bral ba lags sam/
109b4(mdo sde): ji ga stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams 'og tu mnar ma mchis pa la thug pa yan chad dang / steng du 'og min gyi gnas kyi mthar thug pa'i bar dag 'od zer gser gyi
109b5(mdo sde): kha dog lta bus snang bar 'gyur lags sam/ jig lha thams cad kyis phyag bgyis lags sam/ dza ga bdud kyi sa dang na mkha' dang dpag tshad sum bcu tshun cad dpung gis khyab
109b6(mdo sde): par bgyi te mchis par 'gyur lags sam/ jig sems kyi skad gcig cig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi rnam par grol lags sam/ ji ga khyod byang chub pa dang dus cig kho nar
109b7(mdo sde): bdud thams yang dag par bcom lags sam/ sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis kho bo la ji skad smras pa de dag las de'i rgyu cig tsam yang ma byung ngo // bu mo smras pa/ btsun pa sha
109b8(mdo sde): ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying bdas pa la gnas pa la ni yon tan gyi khyad par de dag deng / gzhan yang dag tus bachis pa dag byung bar gyur bas na/ bdun
110a1(mdo sde): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnams par grol ba dang / nyan thos kyi rnam par grol ba'i khyad par ni de lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
110a2(mdo sde): bu mo zla mchog la legs so zhe bya ba byin te/ bu mo legs so legs so// bu mo khyod de skad ston pa ni yang legs so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus bu mo zla mchog gi lag pa g.yas par
110a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku pad+ma la bzhugs par byung bar gyur pa gang yin pa de pad+ma'i gdan de las mngon par 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom
110a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das nyid kyi sku lte ba li khung bur zhugs so// de nas de'i mod la sangs rgyas kyi mthus sa chen po rab tu g.yos par gyur cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i khung bu thams cad
110a5(mdo sde): nas pad+ma gser gyi mdog tu snang ba sdong bu rnams ni gser/ 'dab ma rnams ni dngul/ snying po rnams ni rin po che dpal gyis snying po las grub pa dag byang bar gyur to// pad+ma de dag la
110a6(mdo sde): yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan kyis legs par brgyan pa/ pad+ma la bzhugs pa dag kyang kun tu snang bar gyur cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig
110a7(mdo sde): rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa mu med pa dag tu gshegs te/ sangs rgyas med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ chos ston par kun tu snang zhing / 'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi mthus
110a8(mdo sde): chos ston pa de dag kyang 'dir kun tu grag go// de nas bu mo zla mchog gis de lta bu'i/ cho 'phrul chen po mthong nas/ dga' zhing mgul yid rang ste/ rab tu dga' zhing dga'
110b1(mdo sde): dang / yad bde bsdes nas/ des lag pa gsas pan dgas par gyu ba ban pa dasas ldan 'dapags pa der pogasung mas so// mang
110b2(mdo sde): pad+ma de me tog khang pa rtsegs pa gru ba'i ldam pa/ ka ba bzhi zug pa/ nasaHma ga/ shin tu rnam par bye ba zhig tu gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das k+She dbu'i gtsug gi drang da kyi
110b3(mdo sde): namakha' la 'dug par gyur to// khang ba brtsegs pa der yang khri gan+d+ha dang pa rin po ches spros pa lnga'i ras btsos dri bu 'bum phrag du ma bting ba zhig byung bar gyur to// TI gdan
110b4(mdo sde): de la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zhig bzhugs par yang kun tu snang ngo // des pad+ma de 'apangs nas bcom
110b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dir ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la gnas pa'i sems can rnams la ngar 'dzin pa dang /
110b6(mdo sde): nga yir 'dzin pa spang ba'i slad du chos bston par gyur cig/ yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma gnyis pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang des de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba/
110b7(mdo sde): de logs su 'phangs so// 'phangs ma thags du pad+ma de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa gnyis pa zhig du gyur pa dang / des tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to//
110b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang 'brel ba'i sems can rnams la 'jig tshogs la lta ba spang ba'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig/ yang sangs
112a1(mdo sde): / rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma gsum pa zhig du byung bar gyur pa dang / des de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs so// 'phangs ma
112a2(mdo sde): zag tu pad+ma de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa gsum pa zhig du gyur pa dang / tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba/
112a3(mdo sde): 'dis rtogs pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa dang / 'dod chags/ zhe sdang dang / gti mug spang ba'i slad du sems can rnams la chos ston par gyur cig/ yang sangs
112a4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma bzhi pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'phangs so// 'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du
112a5(mdo sde): pad+ma'i khang bu brtsegs pa bzhi pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis phyin ci log bzhi spang ba'i slad du sems
112a6(mdo sde): rnams la chos ston par gyur cig/ yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag sa pa pad+ma lnga pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logasu 'phangs so//
112a7(mdo sde): 'phangs ma thag du pad+ma de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma khang bu rtsegs pa lnga pa zhig du gyur pa dang / tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i
112a8(mdo sde): rtsa ba 'dis sgrib pa lnga dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la sgrib pa lnga spangs pa'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma drug pa bzhig byung bar/
112b1(mdo sde): gyur pa dang / des de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der log su 'phangs so// 'bangs ma thag tu pad+ma de la yang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang bu rtsegs pa drug pa zhig
112b2(mdo sde): du gyur pa dang / tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa 'dis skye mched drug la rten pa'i sems can rnams la/ skye mched drug yongs su 'tshal bar
112b3(mdo sde): bgyi ba'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig/ yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma bdun pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su 'phang //
112b4(mdo sde): 'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa bdun pa zhig du gyur pa dang tshig 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i
112b5(mdo sde): rtsa ba 'dis rnam par shes pa gnas pa bdun dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la rnam par shes pa gnas pa bdun yongs su 'tshal bar bgyi ba'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig/ yang
112b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma brgyad pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs so 'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de yang bcom
112b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi steng tu pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa brgyad pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis log pa
112b8(mdo sde): nyid brgyad la nges pa'i sems can rnams la log pa la nyid brgyad nges par spang ba'i slad du chos ston par gyur gcig/ yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par bad+ma dgu pa
114a1(mdo sde): zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su 'phangs so// 'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi
114a2(mdo sde): steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa dgu pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos
114a3(mdo sde): po dgu la gnas pa'i sems can rnams la kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po dgu spang ba'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig/ yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma
114a4(mdo sde): bcu pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs so// 'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang
114a5(mdo sde): zad kyi stong du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa bcu pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / tshig 'di skad du ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ji ltar bcom ldan
114a6(mdo sde): 'das phyogs bcur snang bas khyab par mdzad pa ltar stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig/ de nas pad+ma'i khang pa rtsegs pa de dag gong nas gong du brtsegs pa'i 'phangs
114a7(mdo sde): gis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi mthar thug par gyur to// de'i tshes bla ba'i lha yan chad nas tshangs ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams la pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gis yang dag par bskul
114a8(mdo sde): nas/ lha bye ba phrag dpag tu med pa dag 'dus par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos nyid de/ gang gis tshong bu
114b1(mdo sde): mdzad pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs kha dog 'bum phrag du ma 'di lta ste sngon po dang / ser po dang dmar po dang / dkar po dang bcod
114b2(mdo sde): dang / shel dang dngul kyi kha dog lta bu dag byung te/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas musbed pa dag snang bas khyab par byas nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du mngon par
114b3(mdo sde): 'phags ste/ 'od kyis nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od zil gyis gnan nas/ phyir log ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu'i gtsug tu nub po// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan lnga
114b4(mdo sde): ste/ bla gos brag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lho nga sa la gtsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba te log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan
114b5(mdo sde): 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis 'dzum pa'i don yongs su zhus pa/ mkhyen pa kun la mngon sum spyan mnga' zhing // chos rnams kun la nem nur rnam par rgal/
114b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten kun dang mi mnyam mthu mnga' ba// rgyal dbang ci slad 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad// khyod kyis mtha' yas dus nas byin pa byin// khyod khrims rnam dag nor bu rin chen 'dra/ khyod
114b7(mdo sde): kyi bzod pa mi g.yo lhun po bzhin// drang srong chen po ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad// bsam gtan skyes shing brtson 'grus stobs ldan pa// gnod bral na dang rga las rnam par grol/
114b8(mdo sde): rgya mtsho 'dra bar bar shin tub pa'i gru bathub chen ci srad 'dzum pa rab tu mdang / byams la gnos shing thugs rjer gnas pa'i// thub pa btang snyoms dang ni dga' la gnas/
115a1(mdo sde): 'dod chags la sogs 'jigs bsal rab tu zhing // thub dbang ci slang 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad// khyod bu gcig nas byung ba'i 'od zer gyis/
115a2(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten mtha' yas khams rnamasu// nyi zla myur du mgo mgo rab mdzad de// gzi brjid zil gyis gnon cing mig kyang stsal// 'gro ba'i mgon cig khyod gsung rnam
115a3(mdo sde): par dag/ snyan cing yid 'ong yan lag drug bcu ldan// gang dag nyan pa de dag mi ngom zhing // nyon rmongs thams cad ma lus zhi bar bgyid// phyogs bcu mtha' yas sems can gang
115a4(mdo sde): mchis pa'i// sems kyi spyod pa du ma gang lags pa// de khyen de dag sum nyi bcod pa'o// rang byung ci slad 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad// deng su'i sems ni byang chub smad nges// su zhig
115a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas theg pa yangs par zhugs// khyab bdag gang gis yid bsam rab tu grub// thub dbang ci sprad 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad// gang gis de ring bdun bzhi pham bgyis shing /
115a6(mdo sde): nyon mongs bdud dang 'chi bdag bdud chen dang // gang bdag chen dang // gang gis phung po lta bu mang po'i bdud// pham par bgyis sam ci slad khyod 'dzum mdzad// su zhig de ring
